title: Diamond TOP laner looking for team | Suche team

embed.title: Ameliorate - Summoner search results - League of Legends
embed.description: Ameliorate / Diamond 5 10LP / 849W 810L Win Ratio 51% / Fiora - 332W 243L Win Ratio 58%, Vayne - 153W 150L Win Ratio 50%, Jhin - 66W 75L Win Ratio 47%, Irelia - 67W 62L Win Ratio 52%, Ezreal - 63W 57L Win Ratio 53%

body:
**English:**
Hello,

I am still looking for a team. I am top lane main, currently dia 5.

I play mainly aggressive top lane champions, like Fiora, Irelia, Kennen, Ekko and others.
Currently #350  Fiora in the world.

Looking for team which speaks English, but I know German as well, so if you are still looking for top laner, simply contact me in game, or here. 

Ameliorate


**Deutsch:**
Hallo

Ich suche ein Team für die Schlacht um Runeterra.
Top Lane main, zur Zeit bin ich Dia 5.

350th Fiora im Welt
Falls ihr noch einen Top Laner sucht einfach anschreiben.

Es ist besser wenn das Team englischsprachig ist, weil Deutsch nicht meine Muttersprache ist, aber ich verstehe meistens auf Deutsch auch.

Ameliorate

replies.body: I have added you, if you're still available. text me just in case
